HEADER_NOT_FOUND.message: Header not found for wellbore ${wellboreName}(${wellboreUuid}), MD and TVD is not converted to MSL
HEADER_NOT_FOUND.shortDescription: Unable to convert MD and TVD to MSL for ${wellboreName}

MD_NOT_METERS.message: MD unit for wellbore ${wellboreName}(${wellboreUuid}) is not meters, unit is ${mdUnit}
MD_NOT_METERS.shortDescription: MD unit for wellbore ${wellboreName} is not in meters

TVD_NOT_METERS.message: TVD unit for wellbore ${wellboreName}(${wellboreUuid}) is not meters, unit is ${mdUnit}
TVD_NOT_METERS.shortDescription: TVD unit for wellbore ${wellboreName} is not in meters

DEPTH_REF_NOT_METERS.message: Depth reference elevation unit for wellbore ${wellboreName}(${wellboreUuid}) is not meters, unit is ${mdUnit}
DEPTH_REF_NOT_METERS.shortDescription: Depth reference elevation unit for wellbore ${wellboreName} is not meters

DEPTH_REF_MD_UNIT_MISMATCH.message: Depth reference elevation unit ${depthReferenceElevationUnit} does not match MD unit ${mdUnit} for wellbore ${wellboreName}(${wellboreUuid})
DEPTH_REF_MD_UNIT_MISMATCH.shortDescription: Depth reference elevation unit ${depthReferenceElevationUnit} does not match MD unit ${mdUnit} for wellbore ${wellboreName}

DEPTH_REF_TVD_UNIT_MISMATCH.message: Depth reference elevation unit ${depthReferenceElevationUnit} does not match TVD unit ${tvdUnit} for wellbore ${wellboreName}(${wellboreUuid})
DEPTH_REF_TVD_UNIT_MISMATCH.shortDescription: Depth reference elevation unit ${depthReferenceElevationUnit} does not match TVD unit ${tvdUnit} for wellbore ${wellboreName}

PICK_MD_NOT_METERS.message: Picks: MD unit for pick ${pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier}(${wellboreUuid}) is ${mdUnit}
PICK_MD_NOT_METERS.shortDescription: Picks: MD unit for pick ${pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier} is ${mdUnit}

PICK_DEPTH_REF_NOT_METERS.message: Picks: Depth reference elevation unit for pick ${pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier}(${wellboreUuid}) is ${depthReferenceElevationUnit}
PICK_DEPTH_REF_NOT_METERS.shortDescription: Picks: Depth reference elevation unit for pick ${pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier} is ${depthReferenceElevationUnit}

PICK_DEPTH_REF_MD_MISMATCH.message: Picks: Depth reference elevation unit ${p.depthReferenceElevationUnit} does not match md unit ${p.mdUnit} for pick ${p.pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${p.uniqueWellboreIdentifier}(${p.wellboreUuid})
PICK_DEPTH_REF_MD_MISMATCH.shortDescription: Picks: Depth reference elevation unit ${p.depthReferenceElevationUnit} does not match md unit ${p.mdUnit} for pick ${p.pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${p.uniqueWellboreIdentifier}

PICK_NO_DEPTH_REF.message: Picks: No depth reference elevation for pick ${pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier}(${wellboreUuid}) source: ${source}
PICK_NO_DEPTH_REF.shortDescription: Picks: No depth reference elevation for pick ${pickIdentifier} on wellbore ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier} source: ${source}

INVALID_COORDINATE_VALUES.message: Invalid values in survey samples easting/northing for ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier}(${wellboreUuid})
INVALID_COORDINATE_VALUES.shortDescription: Invalid values in survey samples easting/northing for ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier}

QTZT_NOT_AVAILABLE.message: QTZT is not available for wellbore ${wellboreIdentifier}, QT is calculated from QWZT, QOZT and QGZT.
QTZT_NOT_AVAILABLE.shortDescription: QTZT is not available for wellbore ${wellboreIdentifier}, QT is calculated from QWZT, QOZT and QGZT.

NO_POSLOG.message: No position log found for ${wellboreUuid}, a vertical wellbore using information from wellbore header is provided.

SHOE_UPSIDEDOWN.message: ${diameter} shoe bottom at ${depthBottomMd} is above shoe top at ${depthTopMd}
SHOE_UPSIDEDOWN.shortDescription: ${diameter} shoe bottom at ${depthBottomMd} is above shoe top at ${depthTopMd}

SHOE_BOTTOM_ABOVE_TOP.message: ${shoe.diameter} shoe bottom at ${shoe.bottom} is above top of ${diameter} casing at ${top}
SHOE_BOTTOM_ABOVE_TOP.shortDescription: ${shoe.diameter} shoe bottom at ${shoe.bottom} is above top of ${diameter} casing at ${top}

SHOE_TOP_BELOW_BOTTOM.message: ${shoe.diameter} shoe top at ${shoe.top} is below bottom of ${diameter} casing at ${bottom}
SHOE_TOP_BELOW_BOTTOM.shortDescription: ${shoe.diameter} shoe top at ${shoe.top} is below bottom of ${diameter} casing at ${bottom}

MISSING_WGS84_COORDS.message: Exploration wellbore: ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier}, uuid: ${wellboreUuid}, Data issue: missing WGS84 coordinate data. Wellbore skipped.
MISSING_WGS84_COORDS.shortDescription: missing WGS84 coordinate data. Wellbore ${uniqueWellboreIdentifier} skipped.

PICKS_UNABLE_TO_MATCH_PAIR.message: Unable to find ${match.name} pick for ${current.name}, using ${alternative.identifier} as base for ${current.name}

PICKS_UNABLE_TO_FIND_TOP.message: Unable to find ${match.name} top pick for ${current.name} pick at ${current.pick.md}, ignored
PICKS_UNABLE_TO_FIND_TOP.shortDescription: Unable to find ${match.name} top pick for ${current.name} pick at ${current.pick.md}

UNABLE_TO_MATCH_TOP_OR_BASE.message: Unable to match ${current.name} pick with top or base surface, pick is ignored
UNABLE_TO_MATCH_TOP_OR_BASE.shortDescription: Unable to match ${current.name} pick with top or base surface
